::GoldenEye::

She kept looking back every once in a while to make she she had 
Doolen close by.  Wen he lagged, she would circle back and stay with 
him.  She saw him hang him head.  She flew down and perched on a tree 
next to him. "WHat is wrong love? You look worried and sad about 
something.  I'm worried for you, won't you please tell me what is 
troubling you?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Dollen::
> 
>           Dollen sighed, as he watched GoldenEye take off.  He 
walked towards the group, with his head down in sorrow, not bothering 
to catch up to GoldenEye.
> 
>          "I'm sorry love.  I don't mean to be like this, but, 
nobody can understand.  Nobody," He said glumly to himself.
